channel.title: Need a Pro Bruh

Alright

item.title: Need a Pro Bruh
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

what do you need pro coder for ? advanced coders could pull this very easily.

@Topic; go to client.java and search for

public int getbattleTimer() {

right under it you should something similar to this

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 767 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon]== 1305 ) { return 3000;

This

return 3000;

determines how fast your your weapon is gonna hit.

return 500;

is as fast you gonna get , you canâ€™t get any faster than 500

weapon attack speeds:
1500 = Throwing Knife
2000 = Shortbow
2500 = Whip, Scimitar
3000 = Longsword
3500 = Battleaxe
4000 = 2H Sword, Maul

to add a new return; create a new line

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4508 ) { return 500;

Read full topic
